element.name: Dataset Identifier
element.description: Unique identifier for this dataset (letters only, no spaces)

element.name: Parent Dataset Identifier
element.description: Unique identifier of the parent dataset

element.name: Dataset Description
element.description: Longer description for this dataset (a few sentences).

element.name: Protocol Name
element.description: String from Protocol Name controlled vocabulary

element.name: Protocol ID
element.description: Number from Protocol Name controlled vocabulary

element.name: Organ Site
element.description: EDRN Organ Site (select all that apply)

element.name: Quality Assurance State
element.description: Possible states: Draft, Accepted or Public

element.name: Discipline
element.description: Medical discipline for this dataset (select one)

element.name: Owner Principal
element.description: Distinguished Name of the person or group that owns the data
